title: What is Bharat?
selftext:
Modi Government and its propaganda media has created another misdirection with ‚ÄúBharat vs India‚Äù. But what is Bharat? Is it [helping crony capitalists make billions with corruption](https://www.reuters.com/world/india/business-partners-indias-adani-family-used-opaque-funds-invest-its-stocks-media-2023-08-30/), while [three-fourth of the population is unable to fill their stomach](https://www.thehindu.com/data/as-food-prices-rise-74-in-india-cant-afford-a-healthy-diet-un-agency-report-data/article67256967.ece)? Is it about [hiding the poor behind sheets](https://www.reuters.com/graphics/G20-SUMMIT/SLUM/zdpxrxoaypx/), so you can show off your fake prosperity to world leaders? What does Modi and his coterie know of Bharat?

Those who claim to be proprietors of Bharat must read this poem by Pash.
